member.name: DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable grid-fitting of glyph outlines (also known as hinting).

member.name: DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE.DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE_DEFAULT
member.summary: Choose grid fitting based on the font's table information.

member.name: DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE.DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE_DISABLED
member.summary: Always disable grid fitting, using the ideal glyph outlines.

member.name: DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE.DWRITE_GRID_FIT_MODE_ENABLED
member.summary: Enable grid fitting, adjusting glyph outlines for device pixel display.
